newsitem.title: USA: Monterey Pasta names president, COO.
newsitem.headline: Monterey Pasta names president, COO.

text.p: Monterey Pasta Co on Thursday said it appointed R. Lance Hewitt as president and chief operating officer, effective June 16.

Hewitt replaces Ken Steel, who acted as interim chief executive since Norman Dean resigned last October as president and chief executive. The company said Steel would remain as a member of the board and that the title of chief executive has been eliminated.

Hewitt's previous experience includes 15 years with McCormick/Schilling, leading its new products and marketing efforts; vice president of marketing and sales at the Lawry's division of Thomas J Lipton Inc; and president and chief exective of Tootje International, a refrigerated snack food company.
